title: Nextflow: create an adapated profile for PC (not clusters)
Input Reads location is not recognized by Nextflow
Modify read input options in nextflow config to allow several sequencing runs for the same sample
Create an option to activate the sampling script in a nextflow pipe
body: Desired behavior: in the config file for an analysis, if the option 'sample' (or something equivalent + the fraction - but default value is also good) is provided, the pipe will be run on a new sampling from original read

title: Docker: create a Picard docker ?
body:
Picard and HTseq are still in a conda environment that must be activated when starting the script

We have found no docker images with functional Picard
For HTseq, we should create a docker image containing python and HTseq

title: Conda : path too long
body: Error if the path used to create the conda_for_docker environment by conda is too long ( more than 80 characters )

title: fastq process skipped
body:
process fastq is skipped whith the sample option
this issue was due to a wrong channel implementation in nextflow
solved with correct channel definition in nextflow

title: option --sample bug
body:
Option --sample doesn't work with multiple files

solved using collect to handle multiples files
it was due to bad channel handling
